title: Manage Player Dietary Plan
description: A team nutritionist needs to create a personalized dietary plan for a player looking to gain muscle mass.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player's current weight, body composition, and any dietary restrictions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets all the baseline health data for the player.

tasks.description: Based on the player's goals, generate a daily meal plan with specific calorie and macronutrient targets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed meal plan for the player.

tasks.description: Send the meal plan to the player and the team chef.
